author: Brianna Ehley
title: Trump administration says frontline workers can go back to work sooner after virus exposure
description: First responders and health care workers across the country had previously been off the job isolating for two weeks.
content:
We really looked at the essential workforce and how to maintain that workforce, particularly at this time as we begin to get ready to reopen and have confidence in bringing our workforces back to work, Redfield said.
